item.title: Learing English is not a rocket science.

item.description: Why i learned English I recently watched some interesting videos on bilibli which is about communicating with foreigners in English on website. item.title: English_grammar_sentence
item.author: ricky
item.description: 简单句+简单句 名词性从句 同位语从句 如何区分that引导的同位语从句和that引导的定语从句？ 同位语: that 在从句中不担任成分 定语从句: that 在从句中

item.title: English_grammar_simple_sentence
item.author: ricky
item.description: 状语（就是副词性成分 用来修饰 形容词，副词，动词成分） 补语（能当形容词 或者 名词） 宾语 或者 主语 与 补语能形成 a is b的关系 主语+谓语/表语+主语补语

item.author: ricky
item.description: 形容词，名词，副词 介词 分词介词 由动词发展而来，比如 providing conj. 如果;

item.title: English_writing_daily_003
item.author: ricky
item.description: I do believe in people being able to do what they want to do succesfully, providing they’re committed to this thing and pay considerable time and effort. Last 2 weeks,I browsed many job openings on several job sites. Sensing there’s still chances for developer job perfered in english literally, i decides to practice learing English consictencely. i need to prepare for interview more sufficiently for making a good performance because this is the most difficult time i have even encounter.

item.description: mock interview self-introduction Good morning/afternoon, it’s great to be here. Thank you for the opportunity to this interview. I hope I can make a good performance today.
